reviewText:
Mazinger-Z the box set is coming with 9 dvds, japenese language subtitle english, chinese, and france language.

The image : Is crispy and clear colorful

The sound : stereo. the intro and all the score music is original unedited.

The storyline : is complete uncut footoge

Mazinger-z knonw in U.S.A as a tranzor -z was and continue very popular in all latin america countries and Europe as the first robot pilot for a human pilot, againt evil forces of Dr. Hell and his mechanical beasts send to destroy mazinger-z, his only obstacle to world domination.

I recommend this mecha anime to everybody to add to their anime collection.

buy it before is hard to find.

Thanks and have a nice day.

This box set is not official at all, and was made in hong kong, this is bootleg which was not released by toei animation and dynamic planning. STAY AWAY OF THIS!!! You can get this box in hong kong at 10 dollar!

It is very excellent video and It has been long time since 1980 prime time on TV.  Also it has subtitle to understand what they saying.  I am please with it and still watching to finish the video.

Also Amazon did very good job to deliver it and how to buy online stuff.

THIS HARD TO FIND ITEM IS FULLY RECOMMENDED FOR VERY LOYAL FANS OF THE SAGA I AM NOT DISAPPOINT WITH THIS ITEM VERY SHARP PICTURE AND NICE SOUND WITH SUBTITLES IN ENGLISH GET THIS ITEM BEFORE ITS TO LATE.-
